Title: Love Sick
Plot: Nick and Juliette join Hank for dinner, where Nick discovers Hank?s mystery date is none other than Adalind, the same Hexenbiest who tried to kill Aunt Marie. Meanwhile, Captain Renard takes matters into his own hands when a visit from foreign representatives of his royal bloodline threatens his position. Elsewhere, Monroe and Rosalee are called into action when the lives of Hank and Sgt. Wu hang in the balance.
GuestStars: Jessica Tuck, Marti Matulis, Basil Harris
